abstract: Buffalo Sabres beat Carolina Hurricanes, 4-3, avoiding last-place finish; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Tyler Ennis scored his 20th goal, and the Buffalo Sabres avoided clinching a finish in last place over all with a 4-3 win at home Monday over the Carolina Hurricanes.

headline.main: Sabres Win and Escape a Last-Place Finish
headline.print_headline: Sabres Win and Escape a Last-Place Finish

snippet: Tyler Ennis scored his 20th goal, and the Buffalo Sabres avoided clinching a finish in last place over all with a 4-3 win at home Monday over the Carolina Hurricanes.
